relation: 1) Humans and other living things have evolved due to natural processes such as natural selection.
2) A supreme being guided the evolution of living things for the purpose of creating humans and other life in the form it exists today.
pageTitle: Measurement Wizard| Religion Research Hub | The Association of Religion Data Archives
textBeforeTable: Do you tend to agree or disagree with Darwins theory of evolution, which maintains that human beings evolved from lower forms of animal life over many millions of years? (DARWIN) [More...] DARWIN from Salt Lake City and San Francisco Surveys of Mormons, 1967-1969 (Salt Lake City Sample) This question type specifically references Darwin, asking respondents their level of agreement with Darwin's theory of evolution, often with categories relating to the theory's level of "truth." [ Back to Top ]   Darwinian Theory Category 1: Below are 39 questions from surveys in the ARDA that attempt to measure this concept. The ARDA staff further categorized these questions into 6 types: [ Darwinian Theory | God Created? | God Directed Evolution? | God versus Evolution | Life Evolved? | Scientific Attitudes ] Mouse over a survey name to see further details on a survey.
